creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Skirt of gray-green satin, divided into panels outlined with flat black satin bands. Two main panels richly embroidered at bottom with clouds, flowers, fruit, etc. in shades of blue, rose, yellow and apricot and bordered with band of blue embroidery on black satin. Other panels show simple sprays of flowers, etc., bordered at bottom with same blue embroidery. Unlined. Badly torn at top. Spots on center panel
title: Skirt
